[http://ixbtlabs.com/articles/trendware80211b/ Pictured in this rather old Ixbt Labs product roundup] This device looks identical to the [[Hawking WE110P]]. The estimated time of release is based on the modification date of the files in the drivers provided by '''TRENDnet'''. [[Category:English Documentation]]
